title: Python Numpy Notes
text:
Preface
This book contains my notes taken during my journay of learning and using Python Numpy Package.

title: 1  Introduction
text: Numpy is a Python package for scientific computation.

title: Common Functions
text:
import numpy as np
x_range = np.linspace(-1, 1, 11)
print(x_range)
